the pasticcino bag world tour is back, this time in japan, after stints in venice and paris. a journey to discover centuries-old traditions and the artistic excellence of the land of the rising sun, ranging from refined traditional kimono weaves to the ancient art of loom-woven ropes. the treasure of japan pasticcino bag captures the essence of this journey: japanese elegance and grace is epitomised in a distinctly charming and stylish accessory. the silk-blend satin model is embellished with an all-over jacquard-knit pattern, complete with lurex details. this season, the iconic clutch-style kiss lock clasp has been hand-covered in silk rope, whilst the metal frame features weekend max mara logo detail. branded inner label. the limited-edition model comes with the number engraved on the frame. size: 19 x 10 x 15 cm.

designed in 2013, the teddy bear coat was inspired by an archival garment from the ’80s and immediately became an it-coat. stars and influencers loved its perfect alchemic blend of glamour and playfulness. its special alpaca wool texture on a silk base is created using sophisticated technology developed by the creative team with an italian supplier, capable of producing a unique faux fur. the coat's abundant volume is a celebration of the opulent extravagance of this fabric.
  
    made of alpaca and wool on a silk base.
 
    oversized fit
 
    lapel collar
 
    low-set sleeves
 
    horizontal welt pockets
 
    double-breasted closure
 
    branded lining
 
    horn buttons
 
    length: 110 cm / 43 inches

description: the pasticcino bag world tour is back, this time in japan, after stints in venice and paris. a journey to discover centuries-old traditions and the artistic excellence of the land of the rising sun, ranging from refined traditional kimono weaves to the ancient art of loom-woven ropes. the treasure of japan pasticcino bag captures the essence of this journey: japanese elegance and grace is epitomised in a distinctly charming and stylish accessory. the silk-blend satin model is embellished with an all-over jacquard-knit pattern, complete with lurex details. this season, the iconic clutch-style kiss lock clasp has been covered in hand-covered silk rope, whilst the metal frame features weekend max mara logo detail. practical storage pocket and a branded inner label. the limited-edition model comes with the number engraved on the frame. size: 31 x 13 x 21 cm.

the pasticcino bag world tour is back, this time in japan, after stints in venice and paris. a journey to discover centuries-old traditions and the artistic excellence of the land of the rising sun, ranging from refined traditional kimono weaves to the ancient art of loom-woven ropes. the treasure of japan pasticcino bag captures the essence of this journey: japanese elegance and grace is epitomised in a distinctly charming and stylish accessory. the refined pure silk satin model is embellished with an all-over delicate jacquard-knit floral pattern. this season, the iconic clutch-style kiss lock clasp has been covered in hand-covered silk rope, whilst the metal frame features weekend max mara logo detail. branded inner label. the limited-edition model comes with the number engraved on the frame. size: 19 x 10 x 15 cm.

the pasticcino bag world tour is back, this time in japan, after stints in venice and paris. a journey to discover centuries-old traditions and the artistic excellence of the land of the rising sun, ranging from refined traditional kimono weaves to the ancient art of loom-woven ropes. the treasure of japan pasticcino bag captures the essence of this journey: japanese elegance and grace is epitomised in a distinctly charming and stylish accessory. the silk-blend satin model is embellished with an all-over jacquard-knit pattern, complete with lurex details. this season, the iconic clutch-style kiss lock clasp has been covered in hand-covered silk rope, whilst the metal frame features weekend max mara logo detail. practical storage pocket and a branded inner label. the limited-edition model comes with the number engraved on the frame. size: 31 x 13 x 21 cm.
